channel.title: Help with the following things
channel.description:
Thank you for taking time to look at my thread..
Could someone help me with the following Things
I would like to apply this command " Getuserpassword " ive seen it on other servers and i would like to apply it to mine
Also i would like to Add a News Report every time someone hit's level 99 or 120 If you could help me with these that would be lovely.
thanks alot.

item.title: Help with the following things
item.dc:creator: @Java-RSPS-Noob Java-RSPS-Noob
item.description:
@Java-RSPS-Noob wrote:

For the passwords…

http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/snippets/269945-pi-getpass-command.html

For the 99 stats…

https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,646853.0.html

Read full topic

item.title: Help with the following things
item.dc:creator: @Pk6uhave2 Pk6uhave2
item.description:
@Pk6uhave2 wrote:

[quote=“Null Amount, post:17, topic:528033”][quote author=Pk6uhave2 link=topic=646781.msg4350147#msg4350147 date=1376509789]
I guess no one read what I said other than Fear. I stated that I have encryption for my players .dat’s. Enough said. I never said he cannot do what he wants, just if he does, I’m not helping him.
[/quote]Then why post on his thread in the first place?[/quote]

Because I helped by giving him guides on how to add ::checkbank and ::checkinv. You should read the whole thing before questioning me.

Quote from me, yesterday:
"Any ways, I will NOT give you a code to that. What I will do to solve your problem is give you links on how to add ::checkbank and ::checkinv.

http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/tutorials/288876-pi-check-bank-command.html
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/snippets/447784-check-inventory-command-pi.html"

Read full topic

item.title: Help with the following things
item.dc:creator: @TpK_Dons TpK Dons™
item.description:
@TpK_Dons wrote:

No I didn’t mean it in a harsh way but anyway let’s get off his topic unless we are going to say something useful to help him.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with the following things
item.dc:creator: @IfearI IfearI
item.description:
@IfearI wrote:

[quote=“TpK Dons™, post:12, topic:528033”][quote author=IfearI link=topic=646781.msg4349872#msg4349872 date=1376478871]
I’d go with the advice of pk6uhave2. It would be more handy to have something for you to check its bank for something suspicious when necessary. If that didn’t find anything you can always just manually log in without needing to have his password or write a code to have it. Copy paste your own password in his character file (assuming your source is using character files in raw txt form) log in with the password and after checking its bank put his password back into its place.

Going manually over accounts just sounds like too much work for me anyway
Besides what about a bank command that shows his bank while you’re still logged in on your own account? (::otherbank PLAYERNAME) Just a suggestion.
[/quote]

Dude wtf I said that in my first post, there are already commands such as ::checkbank (player name) and ::chackinv (player name) it’s in many servers such as the hybridpvps…[/quote]

Wtf! Lets all flip the fuck out…

Read full topic

item.title: Help with the following things
item.dc:creator: @TpK_Dons TpK Dons™
item.description:
@TpK_Dons wrote:

[quote=“IfearI, post:11, topic:528033”]I’d go with the advice of pk6uhave2. It would be more handy to have something for you to check its bank for something suspicious when necessary. If that didn’t find anything you can always just manually log in without needing to have his password or write a code to have it. Copy paste your own password in his character file (assuming your source is using character files in raw txt form) log in with the password and after checking its bank put his password back into its place.

Going manually over accounts just sounds like too much work for me anyway
Besides what about a bank command that shows his bank while you’re still logged in on your own account? (::otherbank PLAYERNAME) Just a suggestion.[/quote]

Dude wtf I said that in my first post, there are already commands such as ::checkbank (player name) and ::chackinv (player name) it’s in many servers such as the hybridpvps…

Read full topic

item.title: Help with the following things
item.dc:creator: @IfearI IfearI
item.description:
@IfearI wrote:

I’d go with the advice of pk6uhave2. It would be more handy to have something for you to check its bank for something suspicious when necessary. If that didn’t find anything you can always just manually log in without needing to have his password or write a code to have it. Copy paste your own password in his character file (assuming your source is using character files in raw txt form) log in with the password and after checking its bank put his password back into its place.

Going manually over accounts just sounds like too much work for me anyway
Besides what about a bank command that shows his bank while you’re still logged in on your own account? (::otherbank PLAYERNAME) Just a suggestion.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with the following things
item.dc:creator: @TpK_Dons TpK Dons™
item.description:
@TpK_Dons wrote:

[quote=“Null Amount, post:9, topic:528033”][quote author=TpK Dons™ link=topic=646781.msg4349818#msg4349818 date=1376460379]

[quote author=Null Amount link=topic=646781.msg4349806#msg4349806 date=1376459096]

Reason been… I had it on another server i was trying to work on and it was helpful at points… and this server im using now does not have it… and sort of wanted it…

im in no way wanting people infomation …

It also has to do with " Checking Reported user’s Bank Accounts " for Duped items Seen the server i have Also does not have the feature for me to look at user’s Banks and what not.

you can easily do ::checkbank or ::checkinv…easier to add then ::getuserpassword

@pk6- you act as if he can’t go into the files himself and look at their password…
[/quote]Implying that all server owners save their players’ passwords in raw text format (which is just unsafe).

he doesnt have to save it…there is something called “characters” its a folder in the source files just saying.
[/quote]… I’m assuming you’re talking about a folder named “characters” and inside the folder has character text files named after each player correct?
NOT ALL SERVERS SAVE CHARACTER DATA IN RAW TEXT FOR OWNERS TO SEE.[/quote]

dude more then 50% of them do…maybe even 75%…

Read full topic

item.title: Help with the following things
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

[quote=“Pk6uhave2, post:4, topic:528033”]So you’re planning on logging in to their accounts for every report? Great owner…

Any ways, I will NOT give you a code to that. What I will do to solve your problem is give you links on how to add ::checkbank and ::checkinv.

http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/tutorials/288876-pi-check-bank-command.html
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/google/snippets/447784-check-inventory-command-pi.html

If some one was to give you the command to ::getpassword, that’s like seeing a hobo, and giving him money which he will then buy beer with but lie to you about it. Instead, you buy the hobo food knowing the money you gave him was for a good reason.[/quote]Worst analogy ever.

@OP, check out this page and utilize it.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with the following things

@Pk6uhave2 wrote:

So you’re planning on logging in to their accounts for every report? Great owner…

Any ways, I will NOT give you a code to that. What I will do to solve your problem is give you links on how to add ::checkbank and ::checkinv.

http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/288876-pi-check-bank-command.html

If some one was to give you the command to ::getpassword, that’s like seeing a hobo, and giving him money which he will then buy beer with but lie to you about it. Instead, you buy the hobo food knowing the money you gave him was for a good reason.

item.title: Help with the following things
item.dc:creator: @Pk6uhave2 Pk6uhave2
item.description:
@Pk6uhave2 wrote:

I’m disgusted that you would even want to see your users passwords. I added a encryption to my players .dat’s. If you expect help to do that to your layers then you can forget about getting that information from me.

Read full topic
